title: A true and perfect relation of a great and bloody skirmish lately fought before the city of VVorcester between ten troops of our side consisting of about 500. horse, and the troops of the cavaliers consisting of 1800. horse. Decemb. 8. With the names of the captaines, and other officers and troopers, that were slaine, wounded and taken prisoners on both sides.
author: Bowen, William, Ensigne to his Excellence the Earle of Essex.
